title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Control your airplane with Touch Portal
description:
In this how to we are going to look how you can control your airplane using Touch Portal which is a tool which runs on either an iOS or Android device and can be fully customized.
In this video I will show you how to configure Touch Portal and install the requirements to make it work with MSFS 2020.

Touch-portal download:
https://www.touch-portal.com/

Touch-Portal-MSFS:
https://github.com/Touch-Portal-MSFS/MSFSTouchPortalPlugin/releases

FltSim-msfs2020-Control:
https://github.com/HiDTH/FltSim-msfs2020-Control

Touchportal A320neo and CJ4 Working Title:
https://flightsim.to/file/7406/touchportal-a320neo-flybywire
